4705.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

4706.quoteText: We will not sell your information.
4706.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

4709.quoteText:
We may use third party service providers to support our provision of our services. Such will relate to business functions, including (without limitation) IT support, hosting our data on cloud platforms, legal, accounting, audit, consulting and other professional service providers, and providers of other services related to our business.

Portions of our services may be provided by organisations with which we have a contractual relationship, including subcontractors, and, accordingly, your personal information may be disclosed to them. We only provide these organisations with the information that they need to be able to perform their services.
4709.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

4710.quoteText: We will have in place an agreement with our service providers which will restrict how they are able to process your personal information.
4710.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

tosdr.case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

4720.quoteText: No personal information will be kept any longer than necessary in order to fulfil the purpose it was collected for, and if you ask us to, it will be deleted.
4720.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service
